name: finishTime_setValue
description: This function is used to set the operation completion time for a SmartThings device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to set the operation completion time.

parameters.name: finishTime
parameters.description: The time when the operation should be completed.
